bibl.title: A Note on P. Kellis I 82.
bibl.note: A close parallel to P. Kellis Gr. I, 82 can be found in the Introduction to the so-called 'Second Edition' of the Sortes Astrampsychi (Hercher p. 3). The wooden board Kellis 82 furnishes a complete and perpetual calendar by which the owner would always be able to compute the right time to practise his magic.
bibl.seg: HOOGENDIJK Francisca A.J., A Note on P. Kellis I 82.

A close parallel to P. Kellis Gr. I, 82 can be found in the Introduction to the so-called 'Second Edition' of the Sortes Astrampsychi (Hercher p. 3). The wooden board Kellis 82 furnishes a complete and perpetual calendar by which the owner would always be able to compute the right time to practise his magic.
